Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: production-ready codebase with backtest audit, repo cleanup, and README

Backtest realism fixes \(14 issues from code audit\):
- Add 60s cooldown per market+side, max 3 trades per market
- Add USD-based position limits \(maxOrderUsd, maxPositionUsd\)
- Model 6-cent spread \(3c per side\) matching real Polymarket books
- Fix Sharpe/Sortino to use absolute daily P&L \(not per-trade\)
- Update P&L curve on resolution only \(not trade entry\)
- Pre-compute running EMA for backtest divergence calculator
- Add re-entrancy guard to position manager
- Add 10s orderbook staleness guard in arb-trader
- Persist orderbook state across WebSocket messages
- Add reliable paper trading resolution via periodic polling

Repo cleanup:
- Delete obsolete French design doc
- Delete 46 generated backtest output files
- Add mm_example/, data/output/, data/paper-trades/ to .gitignore
- Exclude mm_example from tsconfig
- Track 4 essential source files \(trading-service, paper-trading-tracker,
  divergence-tracker, divergence-calculator\)
- Rewrite README as production-ready English documentation
- Add comprehensive .env.example with all parameters documented
- Add Telegram bot integration for trade alerts

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
